title: Failure to install caffe2 builded from source
body_html:
I'm folllowing the instruction on the
https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=ubuntu&configuration=compile
to build the caffe2 from source
I followed the guidance from the part Clone & Build and when I tried to finish the final step, which is the "Compile, link, and install Caffe2" by sudo make install, I bump into the question.

Issue description

The processing stucked at
Building CXX object third_party/onnx/CMakeFiles/onnx.dir/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc.o
and I can't find the resolution

System Info

[ 29%] Built target onnx_proto
[ 30%] Building CXX object third_party/onnx/CMakeFiles/onnx.dir/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc.o
/home/yanyy/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc: In function ‘onnx_c2::Tensor onnx_c2::tensorProtoToTensor(const onnx_c2::TensorProto&)’:
/home/yanyy/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc:73:44: error: ‘fail_convert’ was not declared in this scope
fail_convert("Unknown tensor data type");
^
/home/yanyy/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc: In function ‘void onnx_c2::convertAttribute(const onnx_c2::AttributeProto&, onnx_c2::Node*)’:
/home/yanyy/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc:155:44: error: ‘fail_convert’ was not declared in this scope
fail_convert("Unknown tensor data type");
^
/home/yanyy/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc: In function ‘void onnx_c2::encodeTensor(onnx_c2::TensorProto*, const onnx_c2::Tensor&)’:
/home/yanyy/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc:374:44: error: ‘fail_convert’ was not declared in this scope
fail_convert("Unknown tensor data type");
^
third_party/onnx/CMakeFiles/onnx.dir/build.make:110: recipe for target 'third_party/onnx/CMakeFiles/onnx.dir/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc.o' failed
make[2]: *** [third_party/onnx/CMakeFiles/onnx.dir/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc.o] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:1102: recipe for target 'third_party/onnx/CMakeFiles/onnx.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [third_party/onnx/CMakeFiles/onnx.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:138: recipe for target 'all' failed

  • PyTorch or Caffe2: Caffe2
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source (but I take all the step with my custom environment in anaconda)
  • Build command you used (if compiling from source): I do as the exact way from: https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=ubuntu&configuration=compile
    from the part "Clone & Build"
  • OS: ubuntu 16.0
  • PyTorch version: latest?
  • Python version: 2.7.15
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: cuda 8.0 cudnn 7.0.5
  • GPU models and configuration:
  • GCC version (if compiling from source): 5.4.0
  • CMake version: 3.5.1
  • Versions of any other relevant libraries:
body_text:
I'm folllowing the instruction on the
https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=ubuntu&configuration=compile
to build the caffe2 from source
I followed the guidance from the part Clone & Build and when I tried to finish the final step, which is the "Compile, link, and install Caffe2" by sudo make install, I bump into the question.
Issue description
The processing stucked at
Building CXX object third_party/onnx/CMakeFiles/onnx.dir/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc.o
and I can't find the resolution
System Info
[ 29%] Built target onnx_proto
[ 30%] Building CXX object third_party/onnx/CMakeFiles/onnx.dir/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc.o
/home/yanyy/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc: In function ‘onnx_c2::Tensor onnx_c2::tensorProtoToTensor(const onnx_c2::TensorProto&)’:

^

body:
I'm folllowing the instruction on the 
https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=ubuntu&configuration=compile
to build the caffe2 from source 
I followed the guidance from the part Clone & Build and when I tried to finish the final step, which is the "Compile, link, and install Caffe2" by sudo make install, I bump into the question.

## Issue description

The processing stucked at 
Building CXX object third_party/onnx/CMakeFiles/onnx.dir/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc.o
and I can't find the resolution


## System Info
[ 29%] Built target onnx_proto
[ 30%] Building CXX object third_party/onnx/CMakeFiles/onnx.dir/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc.o
/home/yanyy/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc: In function ‘onnx_c2::Tensor onnx_c2::tensorProtoToTensor(const onnx_c2::TensorProto&)’:
/home/yanyy/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc:73:44: error: ‘fail_convert’ was not declared in this scope
     fail_convert("Unknown tensor data type");
                                            ^
/home/yanyy/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc: In function ‘void onnx_c2::convertAttribute(const onnx_c2::AttributeProto&, onnx_c2::Node*)’:
/home/yanyy/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc:155:44: error: ‘fail_convert’ was not declared in this scope
     fail_convert("Unknown tensor data type");
                                            ^
/home/yanyy/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc: In function ‘void onnx_c2::encodeTensor(onnx_c2::TensorProto*, const onnx_c2::Tensor&)’:
/home/yanyy/pytorch/third_party/onnx/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc:374:44: error: ‘fail_convert’ was not declared in this scope
     fail_convert("Unknown tensor data type");
                                            ^
third_party/onnx/CMakeFiles/onnx.dir/build.make:110: recipe for target 'third_party/onnx/CMakeFiles/onnx.dir/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc.o' failed
make[2]: *** [third_party/onnx/CMakeFiles/onnx.dir/onnx/common/ir_pb_converter.cc.o] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:1102: recipe for target 'third_party/onnx/CMakeFiles/onnx.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [third_party/onnx/CMakeFiles/onnx.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:138: recipe for target 'all' failed


- PyTorch or Caffe2: Caffe2
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source (but I take all the step with my custom environment in anaconda)
- Build command you used (if compiling from source): I do as the exact way from: https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=ubuntu&configuration=compile 
from the part  "Clone & Build"
- OS: ubuntu 16.0
- PyTorch version: latest?
- Python version: 2.7.15
- CUDA/cuDNN version: cuda 8.0 cudnn 7.0.5
- GPU models and configuration:
- GCC version (if compiling from source): 5.4.0
- CMake version: 3.5.1
- Versions of any other relevant libraries:
